lyrics:
(Eric Benet)
It’s not your situation
I just need contemplation over you (over you)
I’m not so systematic
It’s just that I’m an addict for your love (ooh...oh)

Am I the only one that holds ya
I never ever should have told ya you’re my only girl
(never should have told you)
Am I the only one that holds ya (no, no)
I never ever should have told ya you’re my only world

(Eric Benet)
Just think how long I’ve known ya
It’s wrong for me to own ya lock and key (lock and key)
It’s really not confusing
I’m just a young illusion, can’t ya see, hey yeah (yeah...yeah)

Am I the only one that holds ya (no, no)
I never ever should have told ya you’re my only girl
(never should have told me)
Am I the only one that holds ya (hey, yeah)
I never ever should have told ya you’re my only world (no no no)

(Faith Evans)
Georgy Porgy, puddin’ pop (oh yeah)
Kiss the girls and make them cry (3x)

(Faith Evans)
Georgy Porgy, puddin’ pop
Kiss the girls, yeah

(Instrumental Portion)

(Faith Evans)
Oh,
Oh kiss the girls, umm...hmm

(Eric Benet & Faith Evans)
Oh, oh oh...oh, oh...oh, oh (ummm...hmmm)

(Eric Benet)
It’s not your situation (umm...hmm)
I just need contemplation over you, babe (over you) (yes i do)
I’m not so systematic
It’s just that I’m an addict for your love, baby

Am i the only one that holds ya (no)
I never ever should have told ya you’re my only girl
(I never should have told you)
(never should have told me)
Am I the only one that holds ya (yeah)
I never ever should have told ya you’re my only world
(never, never, never)

(Faith Evans)
Georgy Porgy, puddin’ pop
Kiss the girls and make them cry (repeat w/ ad lib)

(Instrumental Portion to end)
